titleStmt.title: Time complaining, giueth a most godly admonition, and very profitable instruction to England in this our dangerous tyme Whereunto is added a comfortable prayer to be vsed in this tyme. By Iohn Carpenter.
titleStmt.author: Carpenter, John, d. 1621.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
